Reviews.Title: not a great pick
Reviews.Author: Jim Averso
Reviews.Content: Despite my unit arriving damaged, I was able to get the unit to boot up and I really didn't like the system.  I had to open it up to get the part that broke off during shipping and it is very light weight, minimal support for the hard drive and overall a product of a very low price.  I bought this one from a merchant on Amazon and he shipped it in the retail packaging.  Once informed about it I did receive my refund immediatly after return.I would suggest springing for more money for such an important device.  If you are buying a DVR for security camera's, you would want to rely on it.  About $500 gets you a professional quality 8-channel dvr with 1tb hard drive.
